title: Skript插件粒子效果的英文名有哪些
author: 梅子酒呀
txt_content: 例如wolf hearts, mob spawner flames, 这些类似的粒子效果能在哪里查阅。有点懒得找。

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 浅念哥 于 2018-4-24 19:06 编辑 

插件百科条目最后一次更新是2016年9月，我看了下很多最新的效果都没有，所以去官网查吧。
https://bensku.github.io/Skript/classes.html#visualeffect

Visual Effect
Pattern:ender signal, mobspawner flames, potion break, smoke, hurt, sheep eating, wolf hearts, wolf shaking, wolf smoke, firework's spark, critical hit, magical critical hit, potion swirl, transparent potion swirl, spell, spell, witch spell, note, portal, flying glyph, flame, lava pop, footstep, water splash, smoke particle, huge explosion, large explosion, explosion, void fog, small smoke, cloud, coloured dust, snowball break, water drip, lava drip, snow shovel, slime, heart, angry villager, happy villager, large smoke, item crack, block break, block dust, totem, spit
Since:2.1A visible effect, e.g. particles.
Examples:show wolf hearts on the clicked wolf 
play mob spawner flames at the targeted block to the player
